descriptionHtml:
A Guide Book to Cheats.
Saves the player the trouble of looking up item codes.
A work in progress, All codes not yet implemented...
Coming Soon.

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/22993-1-1345843853.jpg[/img]

My first Skyrim Mod, not my first rodeo...
I have modedd many games in the past for my personal use.
Is the first time I have used the Skyrim Creation Kit.
This is an early version, not all Items are in the book yet.

Explanation and Usage:

I Decided to make this book, for easier use of console codes.
(Instaed of looking up codes and writing them down)

To obtain the book, first install it.
Manual Installation:
Copy the files from the archive to the skyrim data folder.


I am not sure if the .esp saves all the data, but first try and fast travel to Kynesgrove.
Immediately to your right there is a rock wall with a little push cart near it, the book should be there.
If not:
In the console type:
player.additem 0e000d62 1


***********************************************************************************************************************
Special Thanks:


Axhoff - Use of the nif models. I have used the in game nifs but this made it easier.
http://elderscrolls.wikia.com - For images used in book.
http://www.gamefront.com/skyrim-pc-item-codes/ - Code List
http://google.com - For images used in book.
author: nytegoth aka veigh
